other_tests.findings: Restrictive shunting across the foramen ovale.

other_tests.procedure_name: Surgical Excision of Tricuspid Valve Masses
other_tests.findings: Intraoperative finding of 3 firm, large masses on the tricuspid valve with dystrophic calcification and ulceration.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative echocardiogram showed successful repair with mild tricuspid insufficiency and no mass recurrence after 1 year.

other_tests.findings: A huge, crumbly, sclerocalcified mass replacing the whole posterior and one-third of the anterior leaflets of the tricuspid valve.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient did not stabilize and ultimately died due to irreversible hypoxic-hypercapnic respiratory failure.
